lines: 1. Yesu Muponisi Wanga, Wena Ntsako Wanga;
Yesu Muponisi Wanga Ndzi Tlangela Wena; Munghana A Ndzi Na Ye, Wo Fana Na Wena.
2. U Ku Tshemba Ka Mina, Minkarhi Hinkwayo;
Hi Nkarhi Wa Munyama, U Risimu Ranga.
3. Ndzi Tshemba Eka Wena, Mufambisi Wanga;
Kunene Wa Rhandzeka, Ka Vanhu Hinkwavo.
4. U Risimu Ra Ntsako, Kwala Misaveni;
U Risimu Ra Ntsako, Henhla Etilweni.
